verses.verse: And it came to pass after <WH310> these things <WH1697>, that one told <WH559> <WH8799> Yosef <WH3130>, Behold, thy father <WH1> is sick <WH2470> <WH8802>: and he took <WH3947> <WH8799> with him his two <WH8147> sons <WH1121>, M'nasheh <WH4519> and Efrayim <WH669>.

And one told <WH5046> <WH8686> Ya`akov <WH3290>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold, thy son <WH1121> Yosef <WH3130> cometh <WH935> <WH8802> unto thee: and Yisra'EL <WH3478> strengthened <WH2388> <WH8691> himself, and sat <WH3427> <WH8799> upon the bed <WH4296>.

And Ya`akov <WH3290> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, 'Elohim <WH410> Almighty <WH7706> appeared <WH7200> <WH8738> unto me at Luz <WH3870> in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> me,

And said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Behold, I will make thee fruitful <WH6509> <WH8688>, and multiply <WH7235> <WH8689> thee, and I will make <WH5414> <WH8804> of thee a multitude <WH6951> of people <WH5971>; and will give <WH5414> <WH8804> this land <WH776> to thy seed <WH2233> after thee <WH310> for an everlasting <WH5769> possession <WH272>.

And now thy two <WH8147> sons <WH1121>, Efrayim <WH669> and M'nasheh <WH4519>, which were born <WH3205> <WH8737> unto thee in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> before <WH5704> I came <WH935> <WH8800> unto thee into Egypt <WH4714>, are mine; as Re'uven <WH7205> and SHim`on <WH8095>, they shall be mine.

And thy issue <WH4138>, which thou begettest <WH3205> <WH8689> after <WH310> them, shall be thine, and shall be called <WH7121> <WH8735> after <WH5921> the name <WH8034> of their brethren <WH251> in their inheritance <WH5159>.

And as for me, when I came <WH935> <WH8800> from Padan <WH6307>, Rachel <WH7354> died <WH4191> <WH8804> by me in the land <WH776> of Kanahan <WH3667> in the way <WH1870>, when <WH5750> yet there was but a little <WH3530> way <WH776> to come <WH935> <WH8800> unto Ephrath <WH672>: and I buried her <WH6912> <WH8799> there in the way <WH1870> of Ephrath <WH672>; the same is Beit-Lechem <WH1035>.
And Yisra'EL <WH3478> beheld <WH7200> <WH8799> Yosef's <WH3130> sons <WH1121>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who are these?

And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his father <WH1>, They are my sons <WH1121>, whom 'Elohim <WH430> hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> me in this place. And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Bring them <WH3947> <WH8798>, I pray thee, unto me, and I will bless <WH1288> <WH8762> them.

Now the eyes <WH5869> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were dim <WH3513> <WH8804> for age <WH2207>, so that he could <WH3201> <WH8799> not see <WH7200> <WH8800>. And he brought them near <WH5066> <WH8686> unto him; and he kissed <WH5401> <WH8799> them, and embraced <WH2263> <WH8762> them.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, I had not thought <WH6419> <WH8765> to see <WH7200> <WH8800> thy face <WH6440>: and, lo, 'Elohim <WH430> hath shewed <WH7200> <WH8689> me also thy seed <WH2233>.
And Yosef <WH3130> brought them out <WH3318> <WH8686> from between <WH5973> his knees <WH1290>, and he bowed <WH7812> <WH8691> himself with his face <WH639> to the earth <WH776>.

And Yosef <WH3130> took <WH3947> <WH8799> them both <WH8147>, Efrayim <WH669> in his right hand <WH3225> toward Yisra'EL's <WH3478> left hand <WH8040>, and M'nasheh <WH4519> in his left hand <WH8040> toward Yisra'EL's <WH3478> right hand <WH3225>, and brought them near <WH5066> <WH8686> unto him.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> stretched out <WH7971> <WH8799> his right hand <WH3225>, and laid <WH7896> <WH8799> it upon Efrayim's <WH669> head <WH7218>, who was the younger <WH6810>, and his left hand <WH8040> upon M'nasheh's <WH4519> head <WH7218>, guiding <WH7919> his hands <WH3027> wittingly <WH7919> <WH8765>; for M'nasheh <WH4519> was the firstborn <WH1060>.

And he blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> Yosef <WH3130>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, 'Elohim <WH430>, before <WH6440> whom my fathers <WH1> Avraham <WH85> and Yitz'chak <WH3327> did walk <WH1980> <WH8694>, the 'Elohim <WH430> which fed <WH7462> <WH8802> me all my life long <WH5750> unto this day <WH3117>,

The Angel <WH4397> which redeemed <WH1350> <WH8802> me from all evil <WH7451>, bless <WH1288> <WH8762> the lads <WH5288>; and let my name <WH8034> be named <WH7121> <WH8735> on them, and the name <WH8034> of my fathers <WH1> Avraham <WH85> and Yitz'chak <WH3327>; and let them grow <WH1711> <WH8799> into a multitude <WH7230> in the midst <WH7130> of the earth <WH776>.

And when Yosef <WH3130> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that his father <WH1> laid <WH7896> <WH8799> his right <WH3225> hand <WH3027> upon the head <WH7218> of Efrayim <WH669>, it displeased <WH3415> <WH8799> <WH5869> him: and he held up <WH8551> <WH8799> his father's <WH1> hand <WH3027>, to remove <WH5493> <WH8687> it from Efrayim's <WH669> head <WH7218> unto M'nasheh's <WH4519> head <WH7218>.
And Yosef <WH3130> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto his father <WH1>, Not so, my father <WH1>: for this is the firstborn <WH1060>; put <WH7760> <WH8798> thy right hand <WH3225> upon his head <WH7218>.

And his father <WH1> refused <WH3985> <WH8762>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, I know <WH3045> <WH8804> it, my son <WH1121>, I know <WH3045> <WH8804> it: he also shall become a people <WH5971>, and he also shall be great <WH1431> <WH8799>: but truly <WH199> his younger <WH6996> brother <WH251> shall be greater <WH1431> <WH8799> than he, and his seed <WH2233> shall become a multitude <WH4393> of nations <WH1471>.

And he blessed <WH1288> <WH8762> them that day <WH3117>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, In thee shall Yisra'EL <WH3478> bless <WH1288> <WH8762>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, 'Elohim <WH430> make <WH7760> <WH8799> thee as Efrayim <WH669> and as M'nasheh <WH4519>: and he set <WH7760> <WH8799> Efrayim <WH669> before <WH6440> M'nasheh <WH4519>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Yosef <WH3130>, Behold, I die <WH4191> <WH8801>: but 'Elohim <WH430> shall be with you, and bring you again <WH7725> <WH8689> unto the land <WH776> of your fathers <WH1>.

Moreover I have given <WH5414> <WH8804> to thee one <WH259> portion <WH7926> above thy brethren <WH251>, which I took <WH3947> <WH8804> out of the hand <WH3027> of the Amorite <WH567> with my sword <WH2719> and with my bow <WH7198>.
